page.title: 04EDUCATION(page 2)
page.content: Evening activities for boarders include table tennis, snooker, badminton,chess,model railway, art, roller_skating, kites, television (video at weekends)and computers. An open day and sports day are held once a year in which four clubs compete (Livingstone,Baden Powell, Mallory and Scott).These were famous men before 1926,the year the school was founded by Mr.Dudley Bull.In the winter soccer, rugby and cross-country are the main sports. Cricket, athletics, swimming,hockey and tennis are played in the summer. The school gym team enters for the annual I.A.P.S. competition. There are 8 forms and 110 boys in the main school aged 8-13. Several staff live on the premises. { Doods Brown}is a private day school in{Nutfield-}100 children aged 3/11.
